item.title: Fabrizio add a quote by Raymond Chandler
item.description: "Without magic, there is no art. Without art, there is no idealism. Without idealism, there is no integrity. Without integrity, there is nothing but production." -- Raymond Chandler

item.title: Fabrizio add a quote by Hanif Kureishi
item.description: "At the same time, you have to find the right distance between people. Too close, and they overwhelm you, too far and they abandon you. How to hold them in the right relation?" -- Hanif Kureishi

item.title: Fabrizio add a quote by James Ellroy
item.description: "Anybody who doesn't know that politics is crime has got a few screws loose." -- James Ellroy

item.title: Fabrizio add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "The awful thing is that beauty is mysterious as well as terrible. God and the devil are fighting there and the battlefield is the heart of man." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Fabrizio add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Most books on witchcraft will tell you that witches work naked. This is because most books on witchcraft were written by men." -- Neil Gaiman
